TEXT.TITLE: EGYPT REJECTS VEG OIL OFFERS, TO RETENDER
TEXT.BODY: Egypt rejected all offers at a vegetable oil import tender yesterday for unspecified amounts of sunflowerseed oil and/or cottonseed oil, traders said. It has asked for a renewal of offers on March 24. Exporters said they were not prepared to offer material on Egypt's new landed contract terms which include a clause, "free from radioactive contamination." Offers submitted were on old contract terms, all of which were rejected. REUTER
